name: MattleFun
description: Mattle.fun is a gamified trading platform where your on-chain activity fuels your in-game strength. Players enter a vampire-survival-style arena, fighting endless waves of enemies to climb the leaderboard. The twist â€” every trade you make on-chain boosts your power in the game: higher trading volume means stronger characters, better stats, and greater rewards. Mattle.fun is a winner of the Solana Mobile Hackathon.
